title: A small number of samples can poison LLMs of any size
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: Even the biggest AI models are no match for a tiny sprinkle of bad data, proving that size doesn't always matter when it comes to getting poisoned.

title: California enacts law enabling people to universally opt out of data sharing
author: thm
aiHeadline: California finally gives you the power to say 'no' to data sharing, but don't get too excitedâ€”it's probably just another checkbox on a form no one reads.

title: Python 3.14 is here. How fast is it?
author: pjmlp
aiHeadline: Python 3.14 is out, and it's so fast you'll wonder if you even needed that coffee this morning. Spoiler: You still do.

title: Two things LLM coding agents are still bad at
author: kixpanganiban
aiHeadline: LLM coding agents are still clueless about two things, proving once again that even AI can't do everything. Spoiler: The two things are probably things you already knew they were bad at.

title: The React Foundation
author: DanielHB
aiHeadline: React gets its own foundation, because clearly, the world needs another organization to tell you how to build apps. What's next? A foundation for your favorite coffee mug?
